column1: Georgiy Timofeyevich Dobrovolsky (Russian: ???????? ??????????? ??????????????; June 1, 1928 June 30, 1971) was a Soviet cosmonaut.
He is notable for being one of the only three people in history to die in outer space.
After a normal re-entry, the capsule was opened and the crew was found dead.

column2: Dobrovolsky's ashes were placed in an urn in the Kremlin Wall Necropolis on the Red Square in Moscow.

column1: He was posthumously awarded the title of Hero of the Soviet Union, the Order of Lenin and the title of Pilot-Cosmonaut of the USSR.
